events.comment: 1. Smart targeting (by minion health / adjusted angle), Sticky targeting
2. Add hud menu above each generator to let you control it

variable.comment: Anything that needs to be appended to the debug portion of the screen
variable.name: debugMsg

sub-events.comment: Zoom the camera into the spot that was clicked
Zoom in, gradually scroll camera to the target location
Once max zoom has been reached, wait, then zoom out
Zoom out, gradually scroll camera back to center

event-group.description: A grid that objects snap to
event-group.title: Grid

sub-events.comment: Returns a 'grid friendly' coordindate for a given layout coordinate
Returns the UID of the object at the the given location, 0 if there is nothing there
(x,y,angle) returns the uid of the closest object

variable.comment: the distance from the initial point to the current flow object
variable.name: currentDistance

event-group.description: A stream that flows out from a generator
event-group.title: Stream

sub-events.comment: Reset the streams
Connect streams to their flow objects

variable.comment: how far is the flow object from the stream?
variable.name: distanceToClosestObject

variable.comment: what angle is the next flow object at?
variable.name: angleOfNextObject

variable.comment: the UID of the closest flow object
variable.name: closestFlowUID

variable.comment: The two colors of the minions that collided
variable.name: color

sub-events.comment: Find the correct color
Figure out what color to set the outgoing stream to
Create a new stream (unless it is being directed back at a point)
Loop through all of the overlapping flow objects, looking for the closest
Select the closest flow object
Delete the existing stream
Create a new stream (unless it is being directed back at a point)

variable.comment: The two colors of the minions that collided
variable.name: color3

sub-events.comment: Figure out what color to set the outgoing stream to

event-group.description: Flow objects direct minions around the map
event-group.title: Flow

sub-events.comment: Place a new redirector
Only place if there isn't an object in that location
Rotate a redirector

event-group.description: A heads up display that holds menu options and game inventory
event-group.title: HUD

sub-events.comment: Delete a hud object if it is selected and the 'del' key is pressed
A new object has been selected, update the selection rectangle and HUD active object
Select the object within the clicked square
Clears the HUD selection
Clear the HUD display elements
Update the HUD with real time information on the currently selected object
Update the currently selected generator's color if one of the HUD colors are clicked on

event-group.description: A minion generator that spawns minions following a unique path
event-group.title: Generator

sub-events.comment: Destroy a generator label if it becomes unpinned from its base
Destroy a grid block if it becomes unpinned from its base
Create a new generator
Only place if there isn't an object in that location
Change the state of the generator (enable/disable it)
Grab the active label on the generator
Activate the generator
Shut the generator down
Once the generator has fully activated, switch the animation show minions spawning
Spawn minions from each of the generators

event-group.description: Minions spawn from bases and follow a path drawn by the player
event-group.title: Minion

sub-events.comment: Fade the minion trail out over time
Destroy the minion trail node as soon as it fades out
Destroy the minion if it reaches 0 health
Update the minion health bar

variable.comment: The two colors of the minions that collided
variable.name: colorCombo

event-group.description: A health bar that shows the current health of an object
event-group.title: Health Bar

sub-events.comment: Attach a health bar to a minion if it doesn't already have one
Destroy the health bar border if the minion it's attached to is destroyed
Destroy the health bar if the border it's attached to is destroyed
Fire the cannon with a defined ammo at a specific fire rate
If the cannon has been created, but not fully setup, create the additional components and setup all of the initial variables.
Create a line from the cannon out to it's current target
Setup the rocket ammo
Setup the beam ammo
Pin the cannon and range finder to a turret (if that is the base)
Finish up and mark the cannon as fully deployed
See if there are any minions to target

variable.comment: the distance from the turret to the nearest minion
variable.name: distanceToMinion

sub-events.comment: Minion is close enough to target
Check line of site
There is line of site
Fire whatever ammo is active:
Fire a rocket
Fire a beam
Register fired shot
There is no line of site
Draw the range to target
Minion is too far away to target
If the cannon becomes unpinned (probably because the base it was on was destroyed) destroy it

event-group.description: A laser fired from a cannon
event-group.title: Beam

sub-events.comment: Destroy any minion hit by beams
Destroy the beam if it exceeds max range

condition.name: Compare two values
condition.param: abs( distance( beam.X, beam.Y, cannon.X, cannon.Y ) )

event-group.description: A rocket that travels slowly, can destroy bases, and explodes causing splash damage
event-group.title: Rocket

sub-events.comment: Destroy any minions hit by rockets
Kill any rocket that exceeds the maximum flight time
Arm the rocket once it's cleared the cannon
Bounce off other rockets (explicitly done because rockets aren't solid)
Get rid of the rocket, smoke, and explosion once the explosion animation is finished
Kill any minions caught in the shockwave
Move any nodes caught in the shockwave
Destroy the rocket if it goes past max distance

condition.name: Compare two values
condition.param: abs( distance( rocket.X, rocket.Y, cannon.X, cannon.Y ) )

sub-events.comment: If a rocket exhaust becomes unpinned from a rocket, destroy it
If the rocket is ready to detonate (and it hasn't already exploded), create an explosion

event-group.description: A static turret that can act as a stationary weapons platform
event-group.title: Turret

sub-events.comment: Create a new rocket turret at the mouse location
Create a new beam turret at the mouse location

event-group.description: A barrier that blocks line of site
event-group.title: Barrier

sub-events.comment: Create a new wide barrier
Create a new tall barrier

variable.comment: The rate (in seconds) to refresh debug information
variable.name: debugPollRate

action.name: Set text
action.param: objectcount & " sprites @ " & fps & " fps" & "(" & renderer & ")" & newline

action.name: Set text
action.param: "nodes: " & node.Count & " bars: " & bar.Count & " Minions: " & Minion.Count & " MinionTrails: " & MinionTrail.Count & " node labels: " & nodelabel.Count & newline

action.name: Set text
action.param: "generators: " & generator.Count & " flows: " & flow.Count & " streams: " & stream.Count &" gridblocks: " & gridBlock.Count & newline
